General.Name: Beijing Originwater Technology
General.Description: Beijing Originwater Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the water treatment business in China and internationally. The company offers technical solutions for sewage treatment. It also provides recycling with membrane technology comprising of scheme and engineering design, electronic control and system integration technology, system installation and engineering technology commissioning, technical support, trusteeship, and operation related services. In addition, the company offers light environment construction services and involved in municipal, water supply and drainage related services, as well as sells water purifiers. Further, it engages in municipal sewage and industrial wastewater treatment, tap water treatment, seawater desalination, civil water purification, wetland protection, and reconstruction services. Additionally, the company offers solid waste treatment, atmospheric environment treatment, ecological engineering, and restoration technology related services. Furthermore, it is involved in general and professional contracting, environmental pollution treatment, and construction project management activities. The company produces membranes, membrane modules, and membrane equipment. Beijing Originwater Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

5.Name: Mr. Xing  Zhang
5.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
